```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
```

## Scatterplot

```{r scatterplot}
# data()
# ?mpg
#mpg
g <- ggplot(data = mpg, aes(x = displ, y = hwy))
g + geom_point()
```

### I need color!

```{r color}

g + geom_point(aes(color = class))
```
### Shapes
```{r shapes}
s <- ggplot(data = mpg, aes(x = displ, y = hwy, shape = class))
s + geom_point()

```

### Shape size
```{r `shapesize`}
ss <- ggplot(data = mpg, aes(x = displ, y = hwy, shape = class))
ss + geom_point()

```
